awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 24 nominations.

fullplot: In October 1991, a confluence of weather conditions combined to form a killer storm in the North Atlantic. Caught in the storm was the sword-fishing boat Andrea Gail. Magnificent foreshadowing and anticipation fill this true-life drama while minute details of the fishing boats, their gear and the weather are juxtaposed with the sea adventure.
plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.
title: The Perfect Storm
